  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game​(java.lang.String player1, java.lang.String player2, Board board, boolean simpleGame)
      Constructor of the class Game if it's a 2-Player's match
      Parameters:
      player1 - Player 1, the one which choose the deck
      player2 - Player 2
      board - Board where the game is taken
      simpleGame - true if the game is without any God, false if each Player has a God

    • Game

      public Game​(java.lang.String player1, java.lang.String player2, java.lang.String player3, Board board, boolean simpleGame)
      Constructor of the class Game if it's a 3-Player's match
      Parameters:
      player1 - Player 1, the one which choose the deck
      player2 - Player 2
      player3 - Player 3
      board - Board where the game is taken
      simpleGame - true if the game is without any God, false if each Player has a God

      public void removePlayer​(Player player) throws java.lang.NullPointerException

      Parameters:
      player - player to remove
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if player is not present in the list of players
